Text: Thank you very much! Been looking for a Jtag rip torrent forever.

This is a heads up for you who decide on using the modded xex. I just got to the mission where you have to kill the two brothers and because of the zero gravity on the A.I. The game freezes at the beginning of that level. I recommend not using the modded xex at this time in the game or not at all.
Why is the size so small? Does it work fine? Can anybody confirm?

@snajam The size is small because the $systemupdate folder is removed, that folder is not needed to run on a Jtag/RGH. If you're burning it and running the game via flashed optical drive you will need to find the ntsc/pal/region free version, this is only for Jtags/RGH.

Downloaded and works great.
